description:
Cayenne retakes the Great Wall when Ingelmia retreats. But Samonji`s U-Link squad leaves the fortress and advances upon the retreating Ingelmia troops.  In a chaotic battlefield with Arandas and Ingelmia fighting each other, the 8th chases Samonji. Tokimune and Jamie desperately hang on to get back Argevollen, and head for Samonji!
Source: crunchyroll
